channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Russia Bombards Ukraine as U.S. Frustration Mounts

item.title: Kerr County struggled to fund flood warnings. Under Trump, it's getting even harder
item.description: Kerr County applied for federal grants to build a warning system to protect residents from flash floods. Under the Trump administration, that kind of ...

item.title: How El Salvador Is Reaping Rewards From Trump’s Deportation Agenda
item.description: In exchange for jailing more than 200 deportees, El Salvador’s president, Nayib Bukele, has become a favorite of the Trump administration.

item.title: These Younger Democrats Are Sick of Their Party’s Status Quo

item.title: Data reveals FEMA missed major flood risks. And, measles hit highest level in decades
item.description: New data reveals FEMA missed major flood risks at Camp Mystic, where over two dozen died in the Texas flood. And, U.S. measles cases hit the highest l...

item.title: DOGE keeps gaining access to sensitive data. Now, it can cut off billions to farmers
item.description: DOGE recently gained high-level access to a database that controls government payments and loans to farmers and ranchers across the U.S.

item.title: To rebuild from war, Syrian firefighters work to rebuild trust -- in each other
item.description: They were on opposite sides during Syria's civil war and now must do lifesaving work together. A makeshift brick wall divides them in their Damascus f...

item.title: Chance of Finding More Survivors of Texas Flooding Dims as Search Continues
item.description: At least 120 people have died and some 173 people remain unaccounted for statewide after flash floods ravaged the Texas Hill Country last Friday.

item.title: Photos: Before-and-after satellite images show extent of Texas flooding destruction
item.description: Before-and-after images show how the Guadalupe River surged and devastated towns across Texas.

item.title: Ukrainian Intelligence Officer Is Shot to Death in Kyiv
item.description: The victim’s unit played a key role in Ukraine’s surprise attack inside Russian territory last summer.

item.title: La Scala Warns Opera Patrons: No Flip-Flops or Tank Tops Allowed
item.description: Milan’s famed opera house is cracking down on the underdressed, even as it and other European opera companies try to attract a wider audience.
